name: python-stock-agent
description: Python-based stock analysis agent using Cloudflare Workers and Swarms AI

scripts.secrets:set: echo 'Use: wrangler secret put SWARMS_API_KEY' && echo 'Use: wrangler secret put FMP_API_KEY' && echo 'Use: wrangler secret put MAILGUN_API_KEY' && echo 'Use: wrangler secret put MAILGUN_DOMAIN' && echo 'Use: wrangler secret put RECIPIENT_EMAIL'
